step_data.thought:
I can see that I've clicked on the REPORTS link and now have access to the Reports dropdown menu. The menu shows different report categories including Marketing, Reviews, Sales, Customers, Products, Statistics, and Business Intelligence. According to my goal, I need to view sales, products, customers, and other store statistics.

I've already accessed the Orders Report under the Sales section in my previous actions. Now I should explore other report categories mentioned in the goal. Let's look at the Products section next.

Under the Products section, I can see several options including Views, Bestsellers, Low Stock, Ordered, and Downloads. These would provide various product statistics. I'll click on 'Bestsellers' which would give me information about the best-selling products.
